7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (23:11): its probably watiing for you to configure it

a25181847111ff97b9da488c72fdd0bd (23:12): sorry abut the choppy typing
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (23:12): bets its on a 32 bit box  probably on top of zfs
e282c1b5ca7363d9439f97f76f10056d (23:12): 83/104? that asounds like my fucked up blood pressure :)
a25181847111ff97b9da488c72fdd0bd (23:13): jamesd, it's a blaade 100 on top of zfs
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (23:13): hile_, that is smf configuring services
a25181847111ff97b9da488c72fdd0bd (23:13): jamesd, should it really take this long?
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (23:13): rarruda, it probably has a bug in it that kills performance each time the system calls  fsync   and smf config does it about 1000 times or so
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (23:14): fysnc resyncs  the filesystem on every fsync when its supposed to sync the file...
a25181847111ff97b9da488c72fdd0bd (23:14): ah.. so  i guess bad idea to create zzones then...  at lleast when using zfs ?
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (23:15): yes on that box...   ide is painful with the fsync problem
a25181847111ff97b9da488c72fdd0bd (23:15): 85/103 nnow... it's pickingg up sspeed
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (23:15): scsi is much better at hiding it
a25181847111ff97b9da488c72fdd0bd (23:16): bt, i hate the fact that the compute is so dog slow right now that the computer is barelly useful for even using  irc
a25181847111ff97b9da488c72fdd0bd (23:17): i tried to start ussing FSS, but i guesss it didnt help much by noww... specially since most of the CPU  time lives in system/kernel space
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (23:17): http://bugs.opensolaris.org/bugdatabase/view_bug.do?bug_id=6413510
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (23:18): rarruda, don't install  zones on zfs untill it gets fixed or you have lots of time :-)
